definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)
to throw oneself at/to pounce on/to devote one's energies/to flap/to flutter/to dab/to pat/to bend over

sentences.english: Firstly, several current network topology configurations for EPON are presented.
sentences.chinese: 首先介绍了EPON的几种现有网络拓扑结构。

sentences.english: A new topology to realize square wave inversion is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种方波逆变器的新拓扑。

sentences.english: The definition of the pre-R0 separation axiom was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 定义了不分明拓扑空间的拟R0分离公理。

sentences.english: Topology and database configuration and management have been improved.
sentences.chinese: 拓扑和数据库配置和管理得到了改进。

sentences.english: MANET is a network where nodes can move arbitrarily in the topology.
sentences.chinese: 在MANET的拓扑中，节点可以任意移动。

sentences.english: They form a topology, and it is called fuzzy stratiform topology.
sentences.chinese: 层次闭集可以形成一种拓扑，称之为模糊层次拓扑。

sentences.english: They form a topology, and it is called fuzzy stratiform topology.
sentences.chinese: 层次闭集可以形成一种拓扑，称之为模糊层次拓扑。

sentences.english: In the present paper, we discuss the magnetostatic equilibrium of the magnetic field without topological invariance.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论缺乏拓扑不变性的磁流体静力学平衡位形。

sentences.english: According to the point-set topology theory, regions with holes are redefined.
sentences.chinese: 根据点集拓扑学理论，对带孔面域进行了定义。

sentences.english: Controlling routing at the physical network layer embeds policy into topology.
sentences.chinese: 在物理网络层控制路由需要将策略嵌入到拓扑中。

sentences.english: The method of mappings and covers is a basic tool to study general topology.
sentences.chinese: 映射与覆盖的方法是研究一般拓扑学的基本工具。

sentences.english: Create deployment and network topologies for services.
sentences.chinese: 为服务创建部署和网络拓扑。

sentences.english: Topology includes information about both the servers and the applications.
sentences.chinese: 拓扑包括有关服务器和应用程序的信息。
请参阅下面的作业管理拓扑。

sentences.english: Topology discovery of extra-large networks need go through many heterogeneous networks and management domains.
sentences.chinese: 特大型网络拓扑发现需跨越很多异构型网络及管理域。

sentences.english: Consistency in large topologies makes things simpler.
sentences.chinese: 大型拓扑中的一致性使事情变得较为简单。
